name: nature
description: Nature is what makes us all so we need to beautify it. This represent what we all need to survive in a civilization.

name: portrait
description: Nothing is better than a face without modifications or a specific pause.

name: urban
description: A new perspective of the modern town. I want to valorize the architecture and the small details in each building.

name: purple
description: The destination to an other world is not that far. With this purple explore or re-explore the world in a different wat.

name: night
description: The yin of the every places, the peace after the noise. Its pure and reel, night time is one of the best time to take pictures.

name: urban exploration
description: A new world represented with old cameras. A nice contrast to open a new horizon and expose the unseen parts of towns.
